title: First Post!
body: I've had a few versions of the site up now, mostly for testing. At this point I'm starting to get real information into it so you know what that means. Time for an actual blog post, in fact, the first blog post.
I'm also excited to start thinking about how to put the proto-8 and other hardware into a usable form factor, so I picked up some eurorack components. It will be exciting to see how they are made.
That is all for the evening, hope I can remember my server password!
